item.title: Top 55 Useful AI Tools
item.description: The list of useful AI tools is inspired by the Howfinity video “I Tried 1200 AI Tools - These Are the Top 50”. 1. Jasper AI by OpenAI Link to heading Jasper AI, a pioneer in generative AI for content creation, assists in crafting marketing content with the backing of GPT technology from OpenAI. Category: Content Creation and Writing Assistance. Strengths: Intuitive content generation. Weaknesses: May require user edits for precision.

item.title: The Skill Map for a Software Product Owner
item.description: In an ever-changing world of software development, the role of a product owner is constantly evolving, blending a mix of technical knowledge and strategic insight. As the tech landscape shifts, so do the skills required to be effective in this role. This article offers a skill map, thoughtfully designed for both established and aspiring software product owners. It outlines key areas of expertise necessary in today’s market, including development, emerging technologies, marketing, sales, product management, and project management.

item.title: How to set up a static website with Hugo, GitHub Pages and Namecheap as a domain registrar
item.description: Hi there! This is my first post on this site and I think it’s a nice tradition to start it from the explanation on how this site was setted up. Why a static website Link to heading In short the combination of these gives you a very simple, fast and reliable personal blog: Hugo - for generation a static website GitHub Pages - for hosting your static website Namecheap - for buying the domain name of your site Additionally it worth mentioning that the costs of this setup is that your domain name will cost, Hugo and GitHub Pages are free for small blogers.

item.title: About
item.description: Discover unparalleled expertise in software development with pmslava. Here, you have two distinct options: Engage with me as a standalone expert - a Product Owner for your team. Or leverage the collective skills of my experienced development team - hire me with my outsource software development team. Our commitment, in either scenario, is to deliver exceptional quality, tailored to your project’s unique needs. Option 1: Standalone Expert Product Owner Link to heading Transforming Vision into Reality Link to heading As a dedicated and methodical Product Owner with over 20 years of experience in Product Creation and Project Management, I bring a wealth of knowledge and expertise to your software development project.

item.title: Get in Touch
item.description: Welcome to the Connect page! Whether you’re interested in my consultancy services, want to discuss a potential project, or have questions about my work, I’m here to collaborate and provide solutions. Contact Information: Calendar: cal.com/pmslava Email: mail@pmslava.com Phone: +381628544975 LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/pmslava Facebook: facebook.com/pmslava Ready to bring your vision to life or have a project in mind? Don’t hesitate to reach out. Let’s connect and explore how we can achieve your goals together.

item.title: Project Portfolio
item.description: Welcome to my Projects page. Here, I showcase a diverse portfolio that illustrates my own and our team’s versatility in solving complex challenges across various industries. Each project reflects our commitment to innovation, excellence, and client satisfaction. Solutions Across Industries Link to heading LeadFrog: Transforming Event Experiences Link to heading My Role: Product Owner LeadFrog is a groundbreaking SaaS platform for events and exhibitions. Its key achievements include: Boosting lead collection by 32% and efficiency by 83%.
